title: Patch Notes
content: a check for whether you have the Deluxe Edition DLC. Fixed a potential crash when Player 2 leaves a split screen dialogue. Fixed some camera activation issues on split screen potentially causing a crash when Player 2 rejoins a game mid-cinematic. Fixed a potential crash caused by the Reeling condition getting stacked too high. Fixed a crash when dragging the portrait of a dismissed Minor Illusion summon over another party member's portrait. Fixed a bug where using the Mould Chamber in Grymforge
